@Message.ExtendedInfo.Resolution: For 11G systems: Use the iDRAC configuration utility to enable the System Services by pressing on the CTRL+E option on boot up at the targeted system. For 12G and above generations: Use F2 Setup, select iDRAC Configuration, and select Lifecycle Controller Settings, to enable the Lifecycle Controller on boot up of the targeted system.

@Message.ExtendedInfo.Message: System inventory may not be up-to-date because Collect System Inventory On Restart (CSIOR) is disabled.
@Message.ExtendedInfo.Resolution: Enable CSIOR, restart the system and retry the operation. To enable CSIOR, press F2 (System Setup) during system startup, navigate to iDRAC Settings >Lifecycle Controller, and select the Enabled option for Collect System Inventory on Restart.
